languages.text: "Цвета ксеносов причиняют боль, но болью переполнены и их сердца. Или же это... страх? Отчаяние? Не могу разобрать, оттенки слишком чуждые... слишком... ах!" {n}Кассия вздрагивает, и струйка алой крови стекает по бледной щеке.{/n}

"The colours of these xenos are painful to behold, but there is just as much pain in their hearts. Or could it be... fear? Despair? I cannot tell, the hues are too strange... too... Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches, and a trickle of blood runs down her cheek.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Цвета ксеносов причиняют боль, но болью переполнены и их сердца. Или же это... страх? Отчаяние? Не могу разобрать, оттенки слишком чуждые... слишком... ах!" {n}Кассия вздрагивает, и струйка алой крови стекает по бледной щеке.{/n}

"The colours of these xenos are painful to behold, but there is just as much pain in their hearts. Or could it be... fear? Despair? I cannot tell, the hues are too strange... too... Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches, and a trickle of blood runs down her cheek.{/n}

"The colours of these xenos are painful to behold, but there is just as much pain in their hearts. Or could it be... fear? Despair? I cannot tell, the hues are too strange... too... Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches, and a trickle of blood runs down her cheek.{/n}

"The colours of these xenos are painful to behold, but there is just as much pain in their hearts. Or could it be... fear? Despair? I cannot tell, the hues are too strange... too... Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches, and a trickle of blood runs down her cheek.{/n}

"The colours of these xenos are painful to behold, but there is just as much pain in their hearts. Or could it be... fear? Despair? I cannot tell, the hues are too strange... too... Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches, and a trickle of blood runs down her cheek.{/n}

languages.text: 「この異種族たちの色は見るだけでも苦痛ですが、彼らの心も同じくらいの苦痛があるようです。それとも…恐怖かしら？絶望？あたくしにはわかりません。あまりにも奇妙な色合いで…あまりにも…ああ！」{n}カシアは不意に身を震わせ、その頬から血が伝う。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The colours of these xenos are painful to behold, but there is just as much pain in their hearts. Or could it be... fear? Despair? I cannot tell, the hues are too strange... too... Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches, and a trickle of blood runs down her cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「この異種族たちの色は見るだけでも苦痛ですが、彼らの心も同じくらいの苦痛があるようです。それとも…恐怖かしら？絶望？あたくしにはわかりません。あまりにも奇妙な色合いで…あまりにも…ああ！」{n}カシアは不意に身を震わせ、その頬から血が伝う。{/n}

languages.text: « Les couleurs de ces xénos sont difficiles à étudier, je décèle tant de douleur dans leur cœur. À moins que... ce soit de la peur ? Du désespoir ? Je n'arrive pas à trancher, ces nuances sont trop étranges, trop... Ah ! » {n}Cassia tressaille, et une goutte de sang roule sur sa joue.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The colours of these xenos are painful to behold, but there is just as much pain in their hearts. Or could it be... fear? Despair? I cannot tell, the hues are too strange... too... Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches, and a trickle of blood runs down her cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Les couleurs de ces xénos sont difficiles à étudier, je décèle tant de douleur dans leur cœur. À moins que... ce soit de la peur ? Du désespoir ? Je n'arrive pas à trancher, ces nuances sont trop étranges, trop... Ah ! » {n}Cassia tressaille, et une goutte de sang roule sur sa joue.{/n}

languages.text: “这些异形的颜色让人无法直视，但他们的内心同样痛苦。或者说是……恐惧吗？绝望吗？我说不清楚，这些颜色实在是太古怪……太……啊！”{n}卡西娅退了一步，涓涓鲜血顺着脸颊流下。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The colours of these xenos are painful to behold, but there is just as much pain in their hearts. Or could it be... fear? Despair? I cannot tell, the hues are too strange... too... Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches, and a trickle of blood runs down her cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这些异形的颜色让人无法直视，但他们的内心同样痛苦。或者说是……恐惧吗？绝望吗？我说不清楚，这些颜色实在是太古怪……太……啊！”{n}卡西娅退了一步，涓涓鲜血顺着脸颊流下。{/n}

languages.text: «Duele contemplar los colores de estos xenos, pero ese mismo dolor lo albergan ellos en sus corazones. ¿O quizás se trate de... miedo? ¿Desesperación? No sabría decirle; las tonalidades son demasiado extrañas... demasiado... ¡Ah!». {n}Cassia se estremece y un hilo de sangre recorre su mejilla.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The colours of these xenos are painful to behold, but there is just as much pain in their hearts. Or could it be... fear? Despair? I cannot tell, the hues are too strange... too... Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches, and a trickle of blood runs down her cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Duele contemplar los colores de estos xenos, pero ese mismo dolor lo albergan ellos en sus corazones. ¿O quizás se trate de... miedo? ¿Desesperación? No sabría decirle; las tonalidades son demasiado extrañas... demasiado... ¡Ah!». {n}Cassia se estremece y un hilo de sangre recorre su mejilla.{/n}

languages.text: "Die Farben dieser Xenos sind schmerzhaft anzusehen, doch in ihren Herzen liegt ebenso viel Schmerz. Oder ist es vielleicht ... Angst? Verzweiflung? Ich kann es nicht sagen, die Farben sind zu merkwürdig ... zu ... Ah!" {n}Cassia zuckt zusammen, und Blut rinnt ihr die Wange hinunter.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The colours of these xenos are painful to behold, but there is just as much pain in their hearts. Or could it be... fear? Despair? I cannot tell, the hues are too strange... too... Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches, and a trickle of blood runs down her cheek.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Farben dieser Xenos sind schmerzhaft anzusehen, doch in ihren Herzen liebt ebenso viel Schmerz. Oder ist es vielleicht ... Angst? Verzweiflung? Ich kann es nicht sagen, die Farben sind zu merkwürdig ... zu ... Ah!" {n}Cassia zuckt zusammen, und Blut rinnt ihr die Wange hinunter.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu zenoların renklerini görmek acı veriyor ama gönüllerinde de bir o kadar ızdırap taşıyorlar. Yoksa bu korku mu? Biçarelik mi? Emin olamıyorum, renk tonları çok acayip... Çok... Ah!" {n}Cassia irkiliyor ve yanağından bir damla kan akıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The colours of these xenos are painful to behold, but there is just as much pain in their hearts. Or could it be... fear? Despair? I cannot tell, the hues are too strange... too... Ah!" {n}Cassia flinches, and a trickle of blood runs down her cheek.{/n}
